# LabelStyle.Configuration

**Type Alias**

The properties of a label.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Configuration = LabelStyleConfiguration
```

## Creating custom label styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view that represents the body of a label.
- **Body**: A view that represents the body of a label.

items.description: Creates a view that represents the body of a label.
items.name: makeBody(configuration:)
